thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hyunion Holding To Buy Back Company Shares, Plans Fund With Partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hyunion Holding To Buy Back Company Shares, Plans Fund With Partners
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Hyunion Holding Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BUY BACK UP TO 150 MILLION YUAN ($23.73 million) WORTH OF COMPANY SHARES AT UP TO 15 YUANPER SHARE WITHIN 12 MONTHS
* SAYS IT PLANS TO INVEST 150 MILLION YUAN TO SET UP EQUITY INVESTMENT FUND WORTH 301 MILLION YUAN WITH PARTNERS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EfvkE4 ; bit.ly/2G0VsD3 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3220 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
